text:
@GaryLineker Looks great. 
You can see the covid19 just floating around the lovely self righteous folks making themselves feel better.

If they cause a spike in Corona virus.
How is that going to help any cause.
Except put strain on the NHS.
Nothing is going to bring poor Mr Floyd back.
